name: Common Grid File
summary: A CGD file is a Common Grid (CGD) file saved in the Boeing Common File Format (CFF), which is a format used by various scientific programs to store fluid mechanics-related data. It contains the x, y, z coordinates of grid points generated from captured data regarding the flow of liquids, gases, or plasmas. CGD files also store information about the grid, such as grid unit specifications, scaling data, and zone coupling information.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
